title: Rear axle with gearbox and reduction boxes for sale

posts.content:
I have the rear axle, pretty much complete left over from my SA conversion, it has a later gearbox, reduction boxes and all of the rear brakes, no nose, unless you want the spare beetle one I have. It also has a decent 6v starter on it.

Gear box is good and I k ow it works as I've driven my bus about with it.

It's come of my 58.

Â£150 collected asap from Newport pagnell please.

Cheers

Austin
Hi Austin, will have this if you can strap to a pallet I can get it picked up, let me know if that would work, cheers Jony
Hi mate, shouldn't be a problem bud. Need to fish out a pallet from somewhere but I'm sure we can work something out. Are you up in Scotland bud?
Hello Austin, yes nr Edinburgh, will speak to a mate and see if he is passing anytime soon, he won't need it on a pallet, if you can pm me your paypal details, I'll send payment
Hi Jonny, pm'd you bud will all the details. It's a small world isn't it!

John Wyatt wrote:
Hello Austin, yes nr Edinburgh, will speak to a mate and see if he is passing anytime soon, he won't need it on a pallet, if you can pm me your paypal details, I'll send payment


Hi mate, let me know if you want that rear axle, you can bank transfer if paypal isnt working for you still. Cheers.
